Entries.PaulEventLetter4: Farmer @!^^We could really use an expert opinion on the agricultural climate in the valley. Could you stop by the lab one afternoon this week?^^See you there.^^-Paul
Entries.PaulEventLetter10: Hi, @.^^It's time to release our little fiend back into the sea. Want to come help me do the honors?^^Meet me at the pier after dark.^^-Paul
Entries.PaulEventLetter11: My @...^^^Meet me at the tide pools at 9.^^Love,^Paul
Entries.PaulEventLetter14: Dear Paul,^^The Zuzu Academy of Medicine is pleased to inform you that you and your colleague have been chosen for the 'Medical Discovery of the Year' Award.^^The ceremony will commence this evening at 8:00 in Pelican Town, as members of the board are eager to visit  such a significant place of discovery.^^On behalf of the Academy, we thank you for your hard work and service to our community.^^Best regards,^^The Zuzu Academy of Medicine
